item.description:
The Nashua Telegraph sponsors this karaoke contest.

This is the 4th of 4 Tues. preliminary contests at 4 different locations.

See http://www.encorebuzz.com/superstar for all details of the contest.

I plan to compete. Hopefully, Tom D. will compete too. (He has competed in the previous 2.)

There is no cover charge to come and watch, but there is a $5 contest entry fee for participants.

Registration (to compete) starts at 7 PM and the contest starts at 8 PM.

They will cut off contest entries at some point if there are too many people signed up. (They haven't had to do this yet.)

Past experience has shown that the place gets filled up early, so even spectators should arrive as early as possible for seating. I can't guarantee I can save seats for everybody. Also, the place does not have its own parking lot, so you need to find street parking nearby.

Please don't RSVP if you aren't sure you can make it, because it is not nice to be trying to hold seats for and keeping an eye out for people who don't show up.

I have posted this event to other meetup groups too.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a MEETUP sign or my NEIL baseball cap
item.why: There are lots of good singers and it would be nice to have a cheering section.
item.name: karaoke contest
